summary: Junior Researcher at LeidenAsiaCentre, MSc in International Relations and Diplomacy. My current work at LeidenAsiaCentre mainly involves research on the impact of China’s economic footprint and its high-tech sector on Europe under the framework of several projects. I have a particular interest in incorporating advanced quantitative methods, such as text mining and network analysis in policy-relevant academic research.
